Frances Ademola bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe, onye na-ese foto na onye bụbu onye mgbasa ozi. Ọ bụ onye nwe The Loom, ụlọ ngosi ihe nkiri nke mbụ nwere onwe ya na Ghana.
A mụrụ Ademola na July 17, 1928 na Accra
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Government Girls' School site n'afọ 1932 ruo 1939, wee gaa Achimota School site na 1939 ruo 1944

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Westonbirt School, Tetbury, Gloucestershire, England site na 1946 ruo 1948 na Mahadum Exeter, England site n'afọ 1949 ruo 1953. Ọ kwagara Naịjirịa ebe ọ nọrọ afọ iri na abụọ tupu ọ laghachi Ghana n'afọ 1969.
Ademola rụrụ ọrụ na Gold Coast Broadcasting System, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Ghana Broadcasting Corporation site na 1954 ruo 1956 dị ka onye isi mmepụta
Ọ kwagara na Nigeria Broadcasting Corporation site na 1958 ruo 1960
Ọ bụzi onye isi nke Western Regional Programs nke Nigeria Broadcasting Corporation(NBC) site na 1960 ruo 1963 ma mesịa bụrụ onye nwe ya.
Ọ lụrụ Adenekan, nwa Adetokunbo Ademola.
